core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Finance x Swiss Poster Design
Emotion First: Trust, Clarity, Global Access
Content is King: Data must be legible and actionable
Negative Space: Generous padding to signal luxury and ease
Contrast: High contrast for accessibility and authority
anti_patterns: No purple or teal gradients for CTAs
No center-aligned text blocks (unless for specific emphasis)

usage_rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest (0.2em) + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headings, leading-relaxed for body

rules: Primary buttons must be solid Royal Blue
Backgrounds should be White or Off-White (Slate-50)

buttons.style: Sharp corners or Pill-shaped (choose one and stick to it - recommend Pill for mobile friendliness)
buttons.interaction: Transform: scale-95 on active, shadow-lg on hover

cards.style: Flat white background, 1px border (slate-200), no shadow by default, shadow-md on hover

inputs.money_input: Large text (text-4xl), transparent background, centered or left-aligned

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, dark mode (Slate-900) for contrast against light dashboard

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar or hero section
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky headers or modals (backdrop-blur-xl, bg-white/80)
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-xl) for floating elements

media.image_style: High contrast, diverse representation, professional but approachable

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard layout.
Ensure all financial data is formatted with proper locale (en-US or fr-HT).
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and dashboard placeholders.
Follow the 'Anti-AI' spacing rules: use more padding than you think is necessary.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
